welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oldenzaal, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Twente Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
